channel.title: Lessons on Bradin Rohde
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons on Bradin Rohde

item.title: Password Cracking 1020
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson to Hashcat. This lesson will cover the usage of the dictionary, combinator, brute force, and hybrid attack modes

item.title: Password Cracking 1010
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson for password cracking. This post covers the idea behind using hashes, how they are cracked, and various types of password attacks.

item.title: Password Cracking 1030
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductiory lesson to JohnTheRipper. This lesson covers the wordlist, single crack, and incremental attack modes.

item.title: Password Cracking 1040
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: An introductory lesson to OphCrack. This lesson covers the basics of rainbow tables, how to install them, and their usage.
